text: Nguyễn Ngọc Thơ (26 May 1908 - 1976)VietBao Daily News OnlineLife Vice President Nguyen Ngoc Tho was a Vietnamese politician. He was the first Prime Minister of South Vietnam, serving from November 1963 to late January 1964. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1908 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Vietnam
title: Nguyen Ngoc Tho
